Potions

Potions are consumable items in Remixed Dungeon that provide various beneficial or sometimes harmful effects when consumed or thrown.

Description

Potions are glass containers filled with mysterious liquids that provide magical effects when used properly. They form one of the core systems of the game alongside Scrolls.

Types of Potions

  • Potion of Healing - Restores health
  • Potion of Experience - Provides experience points
  • Potion of Toxic Gas - Releases toxic gas when thrown
  • Potion of Paralytic Gas - Releases paralytic gas when thrown
  • Potion of Levitation - Provides temporary levitation
  • Potion of Frost - Creates freezing effect
  • Potion of Might - Provides permanent strength boost (upgraded Potion of Strength)
  • Potion of Strength - Provides permanent strength boost
  • Potion of Liquid Flame - Creates fire when thrown
  • Potion of Invisibility - Provides temporary invisibility
  • Potion of Purity - Neutralizes harmful gases and liquids
  • Potion of Mind Vision - Reveals nearby creatures and items through walls
  • Potion of Mana - Restores mana (magical energy)

Usage

  • Drinking: Consume directly for personal effects
  • Throwing: Throw at enemies or specific locations for area effects
  • Tactical: Use strategically based on current situation
  • Storage: Keep in inventory for emergency use

Identification

  • Initial State: Most potions have generic descriptions before identification
  • Identify: Can be identified by drinking or throwing
  • Potion of Identify: Special scroll that identifies potions without using them

Strategy

  • Identify potions when safe to do so
  • Keep different types for various situations
  • Don't hoard - use when needed
  • Consider area effect potions for groups of enemies
  • Carry healing potions when entering dangerous areas

Related

  • Items - Other items in the game
  • Alchemy - Brewing system for creating potions
  • Shops - Places where potions can be purchased
